Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.listeners

Class BookshelfListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.listeners.Listener<BookshelfSubscriber>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.listeners.BookshelfListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote
public class BookshelfListener extends Listener<BookshelfSubscriber>
provides to the client information about a bookshelf of a player

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • onBookshelfChange

      public void onBookshelfChange(String player, ArrayList<ItemTile> insertedTiles, int col, Map<Coordinates,ItemTile> currentTilesMap)
      when a bookshelf of a player receives new tiles, all the observers are notified
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has the bookshelf
      insertedTiles - the tiles inserted, the first one is the first to be inserted in the bookshelf
      col - the column where the tiles are insert
      currentTilesMap - the map of all the tiles inserted in the bookshelf

    • triggerListener

      public void triggerListener(String userToBeUpdated, Map<Coordinates,ItemTile> currentTilesMap, String username)
      Method used to trigger the listener when a player joins or re-joins a game after a crash, to receive the complete status of the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      userToBeUpdated - the username of the user that needs to receive the updates
      currentTilesMap - is the map the coordinates of the board with the corresponding ItemTile in it
      username - the username of the bookshelf owner
